entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
